thread.section_title: Chocolate Trading Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chocolate Trading Company | chocolatetradingco.com | 6 of 407
thread.title: Emily Keighley
thread.title_full: Chocolate Trading Company reviewed by Emily Keighley

author: Emily Keighley
title: Emily Keighley
text: I ordered a 10kg bag of the chocolate. The website wouldn't let me use my paypal so i phoned in my order. The gentleman helped me and sorted my order, he apologised for the fault on the line and was extremely helpful. I will recommend the Chocolate Trading Company to anyone.
